verses.name: John 8:12
verses.text: Then spake Jesus again unto them, saying, I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life.

verses.name: John 8:13
verses.text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him, Thou bearest record of thyself; thy record is not true.

verses.name: John 8:14
verses.text: Jesus answered and said unto them, Though I bear record of myself, yet my record is true: for I know whence I came, and whither I go; but ye cannot tell whence I come, and whither I go.

verses.name: John 8:15
verses.text: Ye judge after the flesh; I judge no man.
